c74object.name: wa.push2.device~
c74object.description:
connect to an Ableton Oush2 device.
Nexessary if you want to use wa.push2.button or wa.push2.pad

entry.name: connected
entry.description: Is the device connected to a screen server

method.name: int
method.description: in inlet1: toogle pad and button name mode on / off

method.name: signal
method.description: in inlet 2: the jit.matrix to be sent to the screen server

method.name: reset
method.description: send a init message to all pads, buttons, sliders ....
